dict.string:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf540 {\fonttbl\f0\fswiss\fcharset0 Helvetica;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \deftab720 \pard\pardeftab720\qj
\f0\b\fs17 \cf0 Run Template Queries\ \pard\pardeftab720\qj
\b0\fs15 \cf0 Dozens of useful queries have been predefined. These range from simple: \i\b find homologues of a gene or list of genes in selected organisms \i0\b0 to more advanced data mining queries: \i\b find all genes that have transposon insertions overlapping exons \i0\b0 . Search for available templates on the templates tab.\ \ \pard\pardeftab720\qj
\b\fs17 \cf0 Query and Analyze Lists \b0 \ \pard\pardeftab720\qj
\fs15 \cf0 Upload a list of gene identifiers to view graphical and statistical analysis including \b expression graphs \b0 and \b enrichment \b0 of Gene Ontology terms, protein domains, publications, etc. You can create lists from the results of queries, use saved lists in any query and merge, subtract and intersect multiple lists.\ \ \pard\pardeftab720\qj
\b\fs17 \cf0 Use the FlyMine QueryBuilder \b0 \ \pard\pardeftab720\qj
\fs15 \cf0 Advanced users can use a flexible query interface to construct their own data mining queries across the multiple integrated data sources, to modify existing template queries or to create new template queries.\ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardeftab720\qj\pardirnatural \cf0 \
\b\fs17 Export \b0 \
\fs15 You can export results as tab or comma separated values to import into \b Excel \b0 . Genome features can be exported as GFF3 and FASTA. You can also send the results of any query to \b Galaxy \b0 for further analysis.\ \
\b\fs17 Personal Account\ \pard\pardeftab720\qj
\b0\fs15 \cf0 If you log in, you can save all your lists and queries permanently in \b MyMine \b0 . To create an account you just need to supply an email adress. All of your data are kept private.}
